synopsis.text:
Academy of Magic student Fiene's journey in the otome game MagiKoi takes an unexpected turn when the voices of high school broadcasting club members Shihono Kobayashi and Aoto Endou reach Prince Siegwald Fitzenhagen, the game's main love interest. As the two friends passionately discuss the game, they unveil the hidden depths of the seemingly villainous Lieselotte Riefenstahl, who is not only Siegwald's fiancée but also secretly yearns for friendship with Fiene.

In a twist of fate, the game's characters now perceive Kobayashi and Endou as gods, granting them the power to influence the story's outcome. As the two friends unravel Lieselotte's tsundere persona, they become determined to save her from her otherwise tragic fate. With their lively commentary guiding Siegwald, he discovers his fiancée's adorable and vulnerable side, ultimately leading him to challenge the game's predetermined routes.

Can the divine intervention of these high schoolers help Siegwald and Lieselotte overcome their destined misfortunes, or will they succumb to the game's original storyline? Join this enchanting adventure to find out!
